document_data.name: ''Evil Spider Crusher of Doom''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Evil Spider Crusher of Doom''''' was a unique [[item enchantment|enchanted]] [[club]].
document_data.Powers: This club had a ''+2'' enchantment, but when wielded against [[spider]]s its effectiveness doubled into a ''+4'' enchantment.
document_data.History:
This club was designed by an arachnophobic [[halfling]] named [[Caligope]], who sought to finally confront both his fear and the evil [[elf|elven]] [[wizard]] [[Eli-Makar]], whose wizard tower was filled with a variety of abnormal arachnid minions.

Over time this weapon changed hands, until ending up in the possession of the blacksmith [[Conlan]] in [[Kuldahar]] in [[1281 DR]].
